sense.def: Pathological Condition identical with yin tui 陰㿉 , yin (i.e. scrotal) prominence-illness. Yao xing lun 藥性論 Substance Entry di fu zi 地膚子：與陽起石同服，主丈夫陰痿不起，補氣益力，治陰卵㿗 疾 , “Ingested together with yang qi shi it controls dysfunction of the yin [member, i.e. penis] in males unable to achieve erection, supplements qi and increases strength, and cures testicles affected by the ailment of breakdown - illness ”.
